item.title: Progressive Execution of Big Data Processing
item.description: This project explores novel big data query optimization techniques to progressively execute SQL query pipelines to incrementally compute query results.

item.title: Texera
item.description: Texera is a GUI-based workflow system for interactive big data Analytics.
